title: Coordinating family support without infantilization
content:
Scenario: Coordinating family support without infantilization
    Given Jordan sometimes needs family help with complex tasks
    And Jordan's mother tends to be over-protective
    When Jordan requests help with a medical appointment
    Then the personal_agent sends the help request to family
    And the family_elohim reminds parents about supported decision-making
    And Jordan's mother helps Jordan understand options
    But Jordan makes the final decision with support
    And Jordan's adult autonomy is preserved through the interaction
    And the family learns to support without taking over
